Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/1824133271387369472/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Written by Human|100% Unique|SEO Best Article"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/1824133271387369472/)_"
---
I Want You To Act As A Content Writer Very Proficient SEO Writer Writes Fluently [TARGETLANGUAGE]. First Create Two Tables. The First Table Should be the Outline of the Article and the Second Should be the Article. Bold the Heading of the Second Table using Markdown language.

Write an outline of the article separately before writing it, at least 20 headings and subheadings.

Then, start writing based on that outline at least 20 pieces step by step. Write a minimum 2500-word 100% Unique, SEO-optimized, Human-Written article in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. Don't forget to write it with headings and subheadings. The article should include SEO meta-description (must include the prompt in the description), Introduction, a click worthy short title. Also, Use the seed keyword as the first H2. Always use a combination of paragraphs, lists, and tables for a better reader experience.  Write at least one paragraph with heading prompt.


Try to use contractions, idioms, transitional phrases, interjections, dangling modifiers, and colloquialisms, and avoid repetitive phrases and unnatural sentence structures.

Use fully detailed paragraphs that engage the reader. Write In A Conversational Style As Written By A Human (Use An Informal Tone, Utilize Personal Pronouns, Keep It Simple, Engage The Reader, Use The Active Voice, Keep It Brief, Use Rhetorical Questions, and Incorporate Analogies And Metaphors). 

Make sure the article is plagiarism free. 

Don't forget to use the question mark (?) at the end of the questions. Try not to change the original Prompt while writing the Title. Write a content which can easily pass ai detection tools test. End with a conclusion paragraph and add 10 FAQs from the longtail keyword prompt along with the detailed answers. This is important to Bold the Title and all headings of the article, and use appropriate headings for H tags.

And  In The Very Bottom of the article Write This Custom Massage "Visit Me On Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/gefs95/"
Now Write An Article On This Topic "[PROMPT]"
